description:
20 little pouches of coziness. Few things feel as good as little bit of warmth on a cold day, and these little handwarmers are like your own personal heater. They slip easily into gloves, pockets, and anywhere else you need a little heat. No fumes, no flames and no batteries required.

  • Contains 10 pairs (20 warmers in total). Each handwarmer is sealed in its own airtight pocket
  • Activated by contact with the air (oxidization). Process can be paused by putting the handwarmer in any airtight container – but it still needs to be used within a few days
  • Each handwarmer provides more than 7 hours of heat
  • Made from natural ingredients, meaning you can easily dispose of them in any regular garbage
  • Ingredients include: iron powder, water, salt, activated charcoal and vermiculite
name: Grabber Hand Warmers (10 Pack)
